attributes.action: clean the streets of cigarette butts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every where you look there are cigarette butts on the streets. Smokers do not see this as rubbish? I do not throw anything on the floor so why do smokers think it is their right to drop litter? I want the government to actively discourage smokers from doing this e.g. adverts or posters
